Concealers for the perfect no make-up, make-up look 
A good concealer does far more than cover, it’s a little magic wand As nature intended: the great cover up. Photograph: Jason Lloyd-Evans View more sharing options Sunday 5 February 2017 06.00 GMT Last modified on Sunday 5 February 2017 06.05 GMT 
A ll you need for a make-up-free look is… make-up. Concealer isn’t just a spot coverer. As well as hiding under-eye shadows and camouflaging odd bits of skin, it’s a little stick of arrogance, with a light powder to hold it in place. Particularly fine is Laura Mercier’s Secret Camouflage, containing one shade to match the skin’s undertone and one for depth, inviting you to custom-blend your own concealer, right there on your finger.
